iTunes 7.0.1

13 September 2006

Join me in upgrading to iTunes 7.0.1. Follow these simple instructions (Mac only):

  1. Download the iTunes Variations icon set from Interfacelift.com
  2. Choose your favorite (non-blue) iTunes icon, highlight it, select Get Info from the File menu, click on the icon, and copy (cmd+c)
  3. Reveal find iTunes in your Applications folder, select Get Info from the File menu, click on the icon, and paste (cmd+p)
  4. No restart necessary

Happy iTunesing!
